Vigilance, haste
[i]Confidence[/i] – Whenever Ferdinand, Noblest of Nobles attacks with two or more other creatures, creatures you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
[i]Crest of Cichol[/i] – Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Then creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{R}{W}
